#############
maildrake-web
#############

``maildrake-web``
is the HTTP server for Mail Drake. It presents the local message queue
for inspection.

    be rendered with `Docutils`_ to other formats.

    ..  _reStructuredText: http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html
